sentences.en: An exquisite flower adorned her dress.
sentences.cn: 她的上衣上别一枚别致的胸花做为点缀.

sentences.en: Exquisite china soup dishes reposed on silver plates.
sentences.cn: 银盘子上面摆放着精制的陶瓷汤盘。

sentences.en: Exquisite workmanship is the outstanding characteristic of these artistic handwork's.
sentences.cn: 工艺精美是这些工艺品的突出特点.

sentences.en: He has exquisite tastes and manners.
sentences.cn: 他有高尚的情趣和举止.

sentences.en: I was admiring the exquisite workmanship in the mosaic.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在欣赏镶嵌画的精致做工.

sentences.en: She dances with an exquisite fluidity of movement.
She peeled it with exquisite care.
Some of the instrumentation is exquisite, particularly for harp and flute.
sentences.cn: 有些器乐段落谱写得非常优美，尤其是竖琴和长笛的部分。

sentences.en: Such a finding as this exquisite antique is rare indeed.
sentences.cn: 像这样一件精美古物的发现确实少有.

sentences.en: The Indians brought in exquisite beadwork to sell.
sentences.cn: 印第安人带了精美的珠饰来卖。

sentences.en: This exquisite embroidery won people's great admiration.
sentences.cn: 这件精美的绣品,使人惊叹不已.

sentences.en: This vase is a piece of exquisite workmanship.

sentences.cn: 我们欣赏她精致的手工艺品。

sentences.en: What exquisite [ delicate ] ivory carvings these are!
sentences.cn: 这几件 象牙 雕刻做得真细!

trans.tran_en: extremely beautiful and very delicately made
